A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was absolutely dreadful. Never did it once cross my mind that a movie could be worse than the prequels\, but they actually did it. I have no idea how this movie is getting such good critical reviews\, the script was an absolute mess\, it was childish\, it was not Star Wars. The poor mishandling of Luke Skywalker in this film cannot be understated. While Mark Hamill gave an incredible performance\, Luke Skywalker was given the shaft in this movie\, and was not given a moment to shine. Absolute garbage. NOT STAR WARS!
